TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: PC x86 is up...
I've heard that pressing F5 repetedly can make you blind...
It's too long to wait on the Hypeshuttle to get to the Hypetrain! I'm jumping down with my jetpack and riding the roof all the way to .24!
PC has a scratchpad now.

Remember back when KSP downloads were hosted on the KSP servers. Imagine if they still self-hosted.

Yeah! Those were total messes! It took an hour just to get to the download site!
hmm Steam update too whilst we're at it
we must break twitch everyone go watch mator in another window
I stepped away for a cigarette and came back to six new pages
I want someone to post the number of people playing tonight if it comes out today.
That's my hype-level right now.
Yay! Pads are being scrathed! I don't know what that means but I'm still happy
Sir, you have a problem.

Yeah! Those were total messes! It took an hour just to get to the download site!

With this much hype, I probably wouldn't get to play .24 for another week!

data:image/jpeg;base64,

That's my hype-level right now.

Somebody linked direct from Google Images...
It's happening! We're closing in on 0.24! BUCKLE YOUR SEATBELTS IMPACT IN T MINUS 10 SECONDS- Oh wait, that's space-hobo

http://pauljadam.com/forma11y/img/rage-guy-happy-face-tears-of-joy.jpg

That's my hype-level right now.

Das a lot of characters.
Out of the past 10 release hypes I witnessed, this is extreme.

Whoops. I'm so hyped I direct-linked.

Edit: Ninja'd

data:image/jpeg;base64,

That's my hype-level right now.

Oh god the text.

Whoops. I'm so hyped I direct-linked.

That's pretty hyped.

HYPE/10 hype levels.

Seriously this is mental, i go away make a donation and then take about 20mins to catch up on the hype train!

Yeah im a slow reader but apparently feel good about donating....
Scratch pad means release candidate, to whoever didn't know.
we have Scratchpad!....what the hell does that mean?!
what is the status of the pizza mission?
